data.text: Today is #WearRedDay, and February is American Heart Month. Each year, more than 350,000 cardiac arrests in the U.S. occur outside of hospitals, with most happening at home. This month, I encourage you to learn hands-only CPR and support @American_Heart's Nation of Lifesavers https://t.co/QiROWBZoGg

Many producers in Mississippi are burdened with clearing damage from Winter Storm Ferm while continuing to face critical planting decisions for the next growing season, including what crop protection tools will be available. I hope @EPA acts soon to provide clarity on the

I thank @POTUS for approving Mississippi’s request over the weekend for a major disaster declaration following Winter Storm Fern. This unlocks federal resources to help our communities in 38 counties recover and rebuild after this devastating storm.

More details here: https://t.co/Dq8PEUZjz5
